Hello Genius

Let's remember school Our game is called Math Quiz. In this game you have to solve algebraic problems. And to be more precise, you will be given random numbers with a random operator (*, /, +, -). We have two modes here, the first mode is practice. In this mode, you can endlessly solve problems by pumping your skill. And there is a second mode in which you will need to solve the maximum number of tasks in a given period of time. Good luck and have fun playing!

Have fun,
